item.title: CVE-2024-31097|2024-06-04T17:36:46.075Z -- stephan%20spencer -- seo%20title%20tag
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Stephan Spencer SEO Title Tag allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects SEO Title Tag: from n/a through 3.5.9.
